entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grand Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
